participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and optimistic, always looking for ways to bring joy to others.
participant_1.background: My passion for helping couples create the perfect wedding day will not let me give up hope even in the most difficult of situations. I am saving up to buy a new camera. My husband and I love working with our hands and building things together. I enjoy deep sea diving. I got hired last week at McDonald's.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Dedicated and resourceful, always finding ways to make the best out of tough situations.
participant_2.background: I enjoy fishing, but I lost my favorite fishing pole in a boating accident. My mother was a school music teacher. My hobby is sewing. I live in a rural community. I am a hard worker and I am proud of my accomplishments.

content.text: Hello! I love working with my hands and building things too! What have you been working on lately?
Hi there! I have been sewing some clothes for my kids. I also love to crochet.
That is awesome! What kind of clothes are you sewing?
I usually just make simple dresses and skirts. I am trying to learn how to make pants.
Pants can be really tricky! But I know you can do it!
Thanks! I hope so! I have been working on a pair for my son for a while now.
Well I am sure he will love them!
Me too! I am trying to teach him how to sew too.
That is awesome! I wish my mom had taught me how to sew.
It is a great skill to have! I am glad I learned from my mom.
Me too! Thanks for chatting with me! I need to get back to work.
No problem! It was nice talking to you!
